ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Christofer, The answer is yes, you can have any topology with HyperNEAT. You query the CPPN for every possible from - to connection in the substrate. But

Hi Christofer,

The answer is yes, you can have any topology with HyperNEAT=
. You 
query the CPPN for every possible "from -> to" connection in the 
su=
bstrate. But you can disallow input neurons receiving incoming 
connections=
. 

Peter

<christofer_=
fransson@...> wrote:
>
> Dear all,
>

ctor where the input and output

itions in a Cartesian x,y,z

e generates a hypercube like

oblem.

 1 
> output sensor.  
>

e recurrent. The

orms 
ordinary
